verses.verse: "Is not man <S%H582><s%> forced <S%H6635><s%> to labor <S%H6635><s%> on earth, <S%H776><s%> And [are not] his days <S%H3117><s%> like the days <S%H3117><s%> of a hired <S%H7916><s%> man <S%H7916><s%>?

"As a slave <S%H5650><s%> who pants <S%H7602><s%> for the shade, <S%H6738><s%> And as a hired <S%H7916><s%> man <S%H7916><s%> who eagerly <S%H6960><s%> waits <S%H6960><s%> for his wages, <S%H6467><s%>
So <S%H3651><s%> am I allotted <S%H5157><s%> months <S%H3391><s%> of vanity, <S%H7723><s%> And nights <S%H3915><s%> of trouble <S%H5999><s%> are appointed <S%H4487><s%> me.

"When <S%H518><s%> I lie <S%H7901><s%> down <S%H7901><s%> I say, <S%H559><s%> 'When <S%H4970><s%> shall I arise <S%H6965><s%>?' But the night <S%H6153><s%> continues, <S%H4058><s%> And I am continually <S%H7646><s%> tossing <S%H5076><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> dawn. <S%H5399><s%>
"My flesh <S%H1320><s%> is clothed <S%H3847><s%> with worms <S%H7415><s%> and a crust <S%H1487><s%> of dirt; <S%H6083><s%> My skin <S%H5785><s%> hardens <S%H9542><s%> and runs. <S%H9242><s%>
"My days <S%H3117><s%> are swifter <S%H7043><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> a weaver's shuttle, <S%H708><s%> And come <S%H3615><s%> to an end <S%H3615><s%> without <S%H657><s%> hope. <S%H8615><s%>
"Remember <S%H2142><s%> that my life <S%H9132><s%> is [but] breath, <S%H7307><s%> My eye <S%H5869><s%> will not again <S%H7725><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> good. <S%H9185><s%>
"The eye <S%H5869><s%> of him who sees <S%H7210><s%> me will behold <S%H7789><s%> me no <S%H3808><s%> more; Thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> [will be] on me, but I will not be.
"When a cloud <S%H6051><s%> vanishes, <S%H3615><s%> it is gone, <S%H1980><s%> So <S%H3651><s%> he who goes <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to Sheol <S%H7585><s%> does not come <S%H5927><s%> up.
"He will not return <S%H7725><s%> again <S%H5750><s%> to his house, <S%H1004><s%> Nor <S%H3808><s%> will his place <S%H4725><s%> know <S%H5234><s%> him anymore. <S%H5750><s%>

"Therefore, <S%H1571><s%> I will not restrain <S%H2820><s%> my mouth; <S%H6310><s%> I will speak <S%H1696><s%> in the anguish <S%H9496><s%> of my spirit, <S%H7307><s%> I will complain <S%H7878><s%> in the bitterness <S%H4751><s%> of my soul. <S%H5315><s%>
"Am I the sea, <S%H3220><s%> or <S%H518><s%> the sea <S%H8577><s%> monster, <S%H8577><s%> That Thou dost set <S%H7760><s%> a guard <S%H4929><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> me?
"If <S%H3588><s%> I say, <S%H559><s%> 'My bed <S%H6210><s%> will comfort <S%H5162><s%> me, My couch <S%H4904><s%> will ease <S%H5375><s%> my complaint, <S%H7879><s%>'
Then Thou dost frighten <S%H2865><s%> me with dreams <S%H2472><s%> And terrify <S%H1204><s%> me by visions; <S%H2384><s%>
So that my soul <S%H5315><s%> would choose <S%H977><s%> suffocation, <S%H4267><s%> Death <S%H4194><s%> rather <S%H4480><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> my pains. <S%H6106><s%>
"I waste <S%H3988><s%> away; <S%H3988><s%> I will not live <S%H2421><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%> Leave <S%H2308><s%> me alone, <S%H4480><s%> for my days <S%H3117><s%> are [but] a breath. <S%H1892><s%>
"What <S%H4100><s%> is man <S%H582><s%> that Thou dost magnify <S%H1431><s%> him, And that Thou art concerned <S%H7896><s%> <S%H3820><s%> about <S%H413><s%> him,
That Thou dost examine <S%H6485><s%> him every morning, <S%H1242><s%> And try <S%H974><s%> him every moment <S%H7281><s%>?

"Wilt Thou never <S%H3808><s%> turn <S%H8159><s%> Thy gaze <S%H8159><s%> away from me, Nor <S%H3808><s%> let <S%H7503><s%> me alone <S%H7503><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> I swallow <S%H1104><s%> my spittle <S%H7536><s%>?

"Have I sinned <S%H2398><s%>? What <S%H4100><s%> have I done <S%H6466><s%> to Thee, O watcher <S%H5341><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>? Why <S%H4100><s%> hast Thou set <S%H7760><s%> me as Thy target, <S%H4645><s%> So that I am <S%H1961><s%> a burden <S%H4853><s%> to myself?

"Why <S%H4100><s%> then dost Thou not pardon <S%H5375><s%> my transgression <S%H6588><s%> And take <S%H5674><s%> away <S%H5674><s%> my iniquity <S%H5771><s%>? For now <S%H6258><s%> I will lie <S%H7901><s%> down <S%H7901><s%> in the dust; <S%H6083><s%> And Thou wilt seek <S%H7836><s%> me, but I will not be."
